title: Video: Formation – Young Ones
content:
Having only recently made their live debut, London duo Formation are streaming a new track lifted from an EP expected early next year.

Still keeping information to a bare minimum, the South London twins truly let the music do the talking on Young Ones, also stepping away from the visuals that characterised their first release. This is how David Byrne fronting LCD Soundsystem might sound; confident, funky and deliriously over the top; it’s further indication that Formation are on to something rather special.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
